subject: Tennis
China Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal lost in the semifinals of the China Open in Beijing on Saturday, falling, 6-1, 6-3, to Marin Cilic. The eighth-seeded Cilic cruised past Nadal, setting up a final against Novak Djokovic, who beat Robin Soderling, 6-3, 6-3.
snippet: Rafael Nadal lost in the semifinals of the China Open in Beijing on Saturday, falling, 6-1, 6-3, to Marin Cilic. The eighth-seeded Cilic cruised past Nadal, setting up a final against Novak Djokovic, who beat Robin Soderling, 6-3, 6-3.
